step1.title: Create your group
step1.description: Start by creating a group and inviting friends, family, or colleagues with a simple link or email invitation.
step1.tip: Tip: Give your group a memorable name like 'Paris Trip 2024' or 'Apartment 3B'

step2.title: Add expenses as they happen
step2.description: Quickly record expenses with our intuitive interface. Snap a photo of receipts and split costs fairly among group members.
step2.tip: Tip: Use the camera feature to automatically extract amounts from receipts

step3.title: Track balances in real-time
step3.description: BuddyBill automatically calculates who owes what to whom. See your group's financial status at a glance with clear, visual summaries.
step3.tip: Tip: Balances update instantly - no need to refresh or wait for calculations

step4.title: Settle up effortlessly
step4.description: When it's time to settle, mark payments as complete or send friendly reminders. Multiple payment methods supported for convenience.
step4.tip: Tip: Use the 'Simplify debts' feature to minimize the number of transactions needed
